lines:
PALANPUR: At least 14 persons were injured when a Gujarat State Road Transport Corporation (GSTRC) bus veered off the road in the hilly area between Navavas and Dhundhiya village near Danta on Tuesday. 

A 19-year-old woman 
 was referred to 
 with serious wounds while others were taken to Danta. 

The bus carrying 16 passengers was coming to Palanpur from Khedbrahma. Sources said that the driver lost control while descending on the hilly road of 
 as the steering got locked.
title: Gujarat State Road Transport Corporation bus overturns near Danta, 14 injured
